column4: has anyone got a solution or anything to get the 10.04iso file to boot from flashdrive, ive tried UNetBootIn and usb_creator.exe, both have failed.
i had a problem with that as well. What's your symptoms?
it says it finishes, i put it in and it doesn't attempt to boot, in 3 different computers
no errors. just doesn't wanna boot
even making it the only boot device
just a black screen after you attempt to boot from flash?
doesn't let me get an option, no warning, just boots up into windows xp, after modifying BIOS
try to remove the  option in kernel line:
ill try burning it and trying it on desktop
i burnt it to cd and it booted into a screen with 2 symbols on the bottom, then it went black
